mdRecord.dcterms:title: Plan of the siege of York Town in Virginia
mdRecord.dcterms:creator: Faden, William, 1749-1836 [original]
mdRecord.dcterms:extent: 1 map : hand col. ; 30 x 33 cm. on sheet 38 x 55 cm.
mdRecord.dcterms:description: The map was published in: Tarleton's History of the campaigns of 1780 and 1781, in the southern provinces of North America. London : T. Cadell, 1787. Cf. Tooley, R.V. Mapping of America, p. 253. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: G3884 .Y6 S3 1781 .F3 1787: Paul Mellon bequest, May 12, 2000. [original]
SPECIAL COLLECTIONS: Area Table 755-421 1781 Faden 1787: Handwritten title on red-bordered adhesive label attached to back. Tracy W. McGregor Library, American History Collection. [original]
